t: Pacific Coast Feather Company - Wikipedia
s: January 29, 2025 - Pacific Coast Feather Company is ... and featherbeds. Owned by the Hanauer family from 1924 through 2017, brothers Nick Hanauer and Adrian Hanauer (fourth generation) were co-chairmen until acquisition of the company by Hollander Sleep Products. President and CEO Mark Eichhorn, also CEO of Hollander Sleep Products, runs the day-to-day operations.
